about.description:
Also have 8 years experience working as hardware and software maintenance technician. I live in the state of Guanajuato in Mexico, have an engineering degree in information technology.

Some words that describe me, proactive, persevering, decisive, adaptable, teamplayer. I´m always in training, currently learning Amazon web services and GraphQL.

projects.title: My projects
projects.project1Description: Has user authentication, CRUD of comments with (like/dislike), saving information in the database, filtering by category/ID, conditional rendering, pagination, contact form, responsive design.
projects.project2Description: Focused sell products/services, has user authentication, payment gateway, dark/light mode, combined filters, minimalist design, search by name, local storage, dashboard admin, reviews/score.
projects.project3Description: You can search, filter, modify, delete and create pokemon, which are consumed through an external API and, in turn, are stored in a database. Made by a lover of this wonderful world.
projects.project4Description: Plan your exercise classes here, this website offers simplicity and clean design,  prioritizes user experience, has responsive design, join us to fit easily and completely your body, do you accept the challenge?

contact.title: Let´s talk!
contact.description: Contact me to start your web development project asilvazavala@gmail.com

footer.title: Contact me!
footer.phrase:
I learn and create every day.
Let's create a project together.
